reviewText: Tyler Perry Jr.  On a bad day.  I hate these silly plays where the characters are so unrelated to reality.

I enjoy and watch a lot of stage plays and decided to try this one. I found it to be funny and it kept my attention. I think the characters did a great job with their roles.  I didn't care for the noise from the audience. The volume could have been better. Other than that I think that it was very good.
